title: Best of The Program | 5/28/20
description:
Protests in Minneapolis over the death of George Floyd turned into violent riots, complete with store burnings and lootings. We were all on the same page here, so why trash the community? The U.S. has surpassed 100K deaths, but the media doesn’t care unless it can bash Trump. Brazil is now the new COVID-19 hot spot. Would you get vaccinated for the coronavirus? What if it was mandatory?
